1188120.name: Fantasy Grounds - Dungeons & Dragons vs Rick and Morty
1188120.description:
Dungeons & Dragons vs Rick and Morty

The world's greatest roleplaying game meets television's most dysfunctional family!
What could possibly go wrong?
Wubba Lubba D&D
Morty wants to learn how to play Dungeons & Dragons... but grandpa Rick's campaign draws the entire family into deadly alternate universes governed by the rules of the game.
D&D has partnered with
Adult Swim to bring this boxed set blending the world of Dungeons & Dragons with the mad narcissistic genius of Rick Sanchez's power-gaming sensibilities, and it includes everything a Dungeon Master needs to channel their inner mad scientist and run a
rickrolling adventure for up to 5 players, levels 1 to 3.
This product includes:
  • Rules module
  • Adventure for character levels 1 to 3
  • Rick & Morty commentary
  • 5 Pregenerated Characters
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Team Twohy LLC, and Zacchaeus
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included D&D fifth edition ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
